column1: #Text=" Pema says : " Well , we had a little scare but everything is okay .
#Text=I fought with him , but he got away .
#Text=And he stole some old necklace that had something to do with ... Guru ... Lak ... shmir .
#Text=" Kya says : " Right ... you know I can never keep all those gurus straight .
#Text=There were like a million of them .
#Text=Remember that long , boring story about that guy who never ate ?
#Text=" Air Acolyte member says : " Avatar Korra is calling on the temple 's radio .
